decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Heritage Statement, Site Location Plan, 21-1011-01, 21-1011-02, 21-1011-03, 21-1011-04, 21-1011-05, 21-1011-06, 21-1011-09, 21-1011-10, 21-1011-11, 21-1-11-12, 21-1011-13, 21-1011-14, Reasonable Exemption Statement.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The side rooflight hereby permitted, shall be conservation style rooflight and shall be flush with the plane of the main roofslope of the dwellinghouse.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B/D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the plans and supporting documents hereby approved, prior to the commencement of the replacement of windows, doors and garage door, detailed existing and proposed elevations and sections shall be provided to, and approved in writing, by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the work. The details approved shall be implemented on site and thereafter be retained.

REASON: To preserve the special interest of the conservation area,  in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B/D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the single storey rear extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single Storey Rear Extension; Installation Of Doors With Three Juliette Balconies To The Rear At First Floor Level; Conversion Of Garage To Habitable Room With Installation Of Window To Side; Installation Of Rooflight In Side Roofslope; Raised Patio At Rear.
